metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Kenosha. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Mark D Berghuis, CFP®|AAMS®|CRPC™
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Daniel J Pascucci, CPWA®|AAMS®

heroDescription: Kenosha, Wisconsin, is a vibrant city located on the shores of Lake Michigan, known for its rich history and diverse economy.
landscapeDescription: Kenosha's economy is supported by manufacturing, healthcare, and retail sectors. The city benefits from its strategic location between Chicago and Milwaukee.
uniqueNeeds: Kenosha requires a focus on economic diversification and sustainable development to mitigate risks associated with industry concentration.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Kenosha's manufacturing focus poses risks; diversify into tech and services. Real estate may face volatility; monitor housing trends. Flooding risks exist.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Kenosha's GDP growth rate is projected at 3.2%, driven by manufacturing and healthcare expansions.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median household income in Kenosha is $62,000, reflecting a stable economic environment.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Kenosha are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Kenosha's cost of living is 5% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Kenosha shows a 4% annual appreciation, indicating a stable housing environment.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Kenosha's business climate is favorable, with incentives for small businesses and startups.
